a1: Supports dot notation ($.key), bracket notation, array indexing ([0]), and wildcard (*) for matching all elements.
q2: How do I access nested properties?
a2: Use dot notation like $.store.book[0].title or $.data.users[*].name to navigate nested structures.
a3: Yes, use * to match all elements at a level. For example, $.store.* returns all values under store.
